features: Ideal for one-handed cleaning under tables, fixtures and hard to reach areas
Ideal for use in malls, restaurants and lobbies
Tough polypropylene with flagged bristles trap fine particles
Will not stain, discolor or absorb odors

body.description: Cut and shaped for easy sweeping; ideal for cleaning hard-to-reach areas. Flagged, chemical-resistant polypropylene fill bristles. For spot cleaning with your dust pan or Lobby Pro Upright dust pans sold separately. 27" long vinyl coated metal handle.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us Durability. Trust. Innovation. Proven performance. These words don’t just describe our products…they describe our brand. These words have been proven true throughout the history of our company. They define who we are today and who we will continue to be tomorrow. Products tailored and designed to address the distinct needs of many different environments can be spotted rolling through the corridors of hospitals, hotels, sports stadiums, office buildings, restaurants and airports around the world.

Utility Refuse All of our products, from the durable BRUTE to the space-efficient Slim Jim, feature designs constructed with the highest quality material to ensure a long life in the most extreme commercial environments. Foodservice Durable, quality products to help you meet industry standards for storing, preparing, serving and transporting food safely. Washroom Whether it's skin, air, or surface care, every product is specifically designed to promote health and wellness, reduce costs, and enhance your facility's image. Decorative Refuse Made to last in any condition and designed for commercial environments with styles ranging from modern to practical. Utility Refuse Foodservice Washroom Decorative Refuse

Material Handling Rubbermaid has set a standard of excellence in heavy-duty platform trucks, bulk trucks and carts. Cleaning Mops, brooms, carts, and more fun from Rubbermaid. Safety A full line of products to keep workers and patrons safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Own a Lobby Pro Dustpan? This is its perfect companion.
reviews.reviewText: EDIT 12/29/15: There are many reviewers giving this broom one star for being too short and not because of any problem with the broom itself. The description states it's a lobby broom, meaning it's meant to be used with the lobby dustpan Rubbermaid sells. You can also see that exact product hanging on the wall next to the broom in the picture I've posted, which should give you a reference on the size of the handle. This was never meant to be used as a regular broom because the handle is designed to make it easier to sweep debris into a long-handled dustpan. To anyone planning on using it as a regular broom, this is not for you. If you're planning on using it with a dustpan like the one in the picture or one that's similar, this broom will work fine for you. I've had this broom exactly five months as of this writing, and it still works just as well as the day I got it.To anyone who might be reading these reviews and thinking of looking into a different product because of all the one-stars as of late, just know that there are many people who didn't know what this product was or didn't do enough research before they bought it. My review--with a picture--has been up for five months, and that's enough visual evidence to show this is not a full-size broom. Sadly, it looks like nobody bothered to click it, and the one-stars have kept rolling in because of the product being "inaccurately-described" or "not what I ordered."In closing, this is better than the Carlisle lobby broom (we use Carlisle brooms at work, and they like to fall apart), and I think it might even be better than the one Libman gives you with the set you can buy in the stores (surprisingly, the bristles on the Libman start falling out after a couple months). If you know what you're buying, I think you'll be satisfied.-------------If you have the Rubbermaid Lobby Pro Dustpan, this is the absolute best accessory you can buy. The broom head is soft and works well with the linoleum and cement flooring where I use it, and the size ensures that everything you sweep up goes into the dustpan on the first try. This is a major step up from the larger broom I was using, where I'd have to make at least two or three passes before everything went into the dustpan.I can't take any stars away from the product for this, but it's important to note that the way Amazon shipped this was one of the worst packing methods I've ever seen in all my years of online shopping. The broom showed up on my doorstep packed in a clear, cellophane sleeve with a shipping label attached. The sleeve was ripped in multiple places, but fortunately, no damage occurred to the broom that I could immediately spot. Knowing how things travel through shipping facilities, it's a miracle something didn't bump into the broom as it traveled down the conveyor and bend the handle or take half the bristles out of the broom head. Amazon usually packs well, but they bungled this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Rubbermaid quality, but...
reviews.reviewText: Let my mistake be YOUR lesson! I wanted a good all black Rubbermaid broom. I saw the picture and ordered it believing it was a standard, basic, regular sized broom. When I received it, it literally became a JOKE in our family. This thing is the size of a childs toys! Disappointed and would not purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is just the right size for cleaning baseboards without bending down. An old cloth around the bristles, fastened to the handle with a rubber band, really picks up the dust well. Bristles could be a little stiffer, but it works, and it's a great tool for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rubbermaid Commercial Broom
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I love these brooms. They are the right size and shape. Our front yard is nothing but red rock and in winter our Walnut tree loses its leaves and these brooms make it easy to pick up the leaves. We have a total of 4 of these brooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: So this was a bit smaller than I expected....but I'm sure if I had read the description more carefully and got out a yard stick I would have been less surprised; it didn't help that it was packaged in a bigger box than necessary. I was really really hoping that the plastic brush wouldn't be the kind that had to be wiped down by hand to get all the stuff off. I may decide to cut it down a bit to see if that will lessen the mess that accumulates on the bristles. But it mostly does the job around the sewing room; I seriously doubt it would last long on cement however.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a good product good price and the right size for my short wife LOL

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was shorter and smaller than I wanted

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: Tutto l'aspetto di un oggetto già usato...
reviews.reviewText: L'oggetto è pensato bene e di buona qualità... peccato che mi sia arrivato verosimilmente già usato, con ilmanico ammaccato, le setole sporche e una serie di carta adesiva arrotolata con molti strati sul manico...che per toglierla un'ora di imprecazioni...Non buono !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 11, 2016

reviews.reviewText: はっきり言いまして期待外れ❗もう少し分かり安い紹介をしてほしいです。

reviews.reviewTitle: Dollar Store Quality - Looks Like a Child's Play Broom
reviews.reviewText: Yes I understand and was well-aware when I ordered this that a lobby broom is short because it's used for sweeping things into a long-handle dustpan. So that's not the issue because that's exactly what I wanted.The problem is, this thing looks like a toy. Very cheap quality like something you'd pick up at the dollar store for your child to play with. For this reason, it's obscenely overpriced and definitely not sturdy or outdoor quality.Does it do the job? Yeah, you can sweep stuff into your dustpan with this broom. But if you're looking for a sturdy quality item that can be used outdoors and will last a long time, I highly doubt that this will meet your expectations.
